logicalColumns.name: -------- Variance Metrics --------
% Change Open Opportunity Line Revenue in Document Currency Same Time Last Year

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN (%1 IS NULL  OR %1 = 0) AND  NOT %2 IS NULL  AND %2 <> 0 THEN 100.0 WHEN (%1 IS NULL  OR %1 = 0) AND (%2 IS NULL  OR %2 = 0) THEN 0.0 WHEN %2 IS NULL  AND  NOT %1 IS NULL  AND %1 <> 0 THEN -(1) * 100.0 ELSE 100.0 * (%2 - %1) / %1 END

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Open Opportunity Line Revenue in Document Currency
